thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: China's CITIC Securities posts 17 pct rise in Q1 profit

title: China's CITIC Securities posts 17 pct rise in Q1 profit
text:
April 27, 2018 / 9:02 AM / Updated 19 minutes ago China's CITIC Securities posts 17 pct rise in Q1 profit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BEIJING, April 27 (Reuters) - Chinaâ€™s biggest brokerage, CITIC Securities Co Ltd , on Friday reported a 17 percent rise in first-quarter earnings.
Net profit for January through March rose to 2.69 billion yuan ($424.24 million) from 2.30 billion yuan a year earlier, the company said in a statement to the Shanghai stock exchange.
CITIC reported a 10.3 percent rise in 2017 net profit to 11.43 billion yuan. $1 = 6.3408 Chinese yuan Reporting by Shu Zhang and Matthew Miller; Editing by Jacqueline Wong
